<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4451</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Opening Phrases for Melody Writing Exercises</string>
            <string language="es">Frases de apertura para ejercicios de escritura de melodías</string>
            <string language="ga">Frásaí Oscailte do Cheachthanna Scríofa Séise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Öffnung Phrasen für Melodie Schreiben Übungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expressions d'ouverture pour des exercices 
d'écriture de mélodie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Frases da abertura para exercícios da escrita da
melodia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Frasi di apertura per le esercitazioni di 
scrittura di melodia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανοίγοντας φράσεις για τις ασκήσεις γραψίματος 
μελωδίας</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This student worksheet is aimed at ordinary and higher level. It is in the style of a Leaving Certificate examination melody question and includes 6 opening phrases (2 OL, 4 HL) for use in the classroom or for homework.  </string>
            <string language="es">Esta hoja de trabajo para los estudiantes está dirigida al nivel ordinario y superior. Pertenece al estilo de las preguntas de melodía del examen del certificado Leaving e incluye 6 frases de apertura para el nivel ordinario y superior (2 OL ordinary leve</string>
            <string language="ga">Tá an bileog oibre dalta seo dírithe ar ghnáthleibhéal agus ar ardleibhéal. Tá stíl ceiste scrúdaithe séise  hArdteiste air agus áirítear leis é frása oscailte (2 GL, 4 AL) le húsáid sa seomra ranga nó mar obair bhaile.  </string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Music</string>
            <string language="es">Música. Melodía. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Melody</string>
            <string language="ga">Séis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Kursteilnehmerbogen ist angestrebte 
gewöhnliche und höhere Stufe. Er ist in der Art einer 
verlassende Bescheinigung Prüfung Melodie Frage und enthält 6 
öffnende Phrasen (2 OL, 4 HL) für Gebrauch im Klassenzimmer oder 
für Heimarbeit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce tableau d'étudiant est niveau ordinaire et 
plus élevé visé. Il est dans le modèle d'une question de 
mélodie d'examen de certificat de fin d'études et inclut 6 
expressions s'ouvrantes (2 OL, 4 HL) pour l'usage dans la salle de 
classe ou pour le travail.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta folha do estudante é nível ordinário e 
mais elevado visado. Está no estilo de uma pergunta da melodia 
da examinação do certificado sair e inclui 6 frases abrindo (2 OL, 4
HL) para o uso na sala de aula ou para o homework.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo foglio di lavoro dell'allievo è livello 
elevato ordinario e puntato su. È nello stile di una domanda di
melodia dell'esame del certificato andante ed include 6 frasi 
d'apertura (2 OL, 4 HL) per uso nell'aula o per lavoro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το φύλλο εργασίας σπουδαστών στοχεύουν σε 
συνηθισμένο και πιό υψηλό επίπεδο. Είναι στο ύφος μιας 
ερώτησης μελωδίας εξέτασης πιστοποιητικών αναχώρησης και 
περιλαμβάνει 6 ανοίγοντας φράσεις (2 OL, 4 HL) για τη χρήση 
στην τάξη ή για την εργασία.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Melodie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mélodie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Melodia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Melodia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μελωδία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
